text: Nice quiet and cosy place for lunch. The cafe is a little out of the way, but the food was yummy.  An interesting find! Sourdough pasta and pita
Can't go wrong with b&c, plank. Good for meals, whiling yr time away, only downside are the stools that don't encourage long sitting, for obv reasons. Eggs Benedict a tad too spicy today
Hands down the best burrata pizza I've had! The other dishes were decent too. Great spot for Italian cuisine.

Dropped by here for dinner and enjoyed the tranquility and peaceful ambience of the outlets at Faber Drive. The sourdough pizza at Plank was lovely and accompanying it with Baker & Cook's cream pasta was awesome. We had a flatwhite and the coffee aroma was commendable. The staff were friendly and the place was not too crowded although we did give up our spacious table for a larger party who would appreciate a larger table and more space. Happy with our meal here!
Our family had lunch in the restaurant which was not crowded and was laid back. Had very good coffee, the trio dips with crostini, B&C bowl, caprese salad and a very nice sourdough pizza.
